# ability checks {#ability-checks .article-title}

Oct 29, 20241 min read
::::::::
:::::::::

An ability check is a [D20
Test](../../../Mourn's-Folly/x.-Game-Mechanics/5e/D20-Test){.internal
.alias slug="Mourn's-Folly/x.-Game-Mechanics/5e/D20-Test"} that
represents using one of the six abilities---or a specific skill
associated with an ability---to overcome a challenge.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: page-footer
:::
:::::::::::

::::::::: {.right .sidebar}
::::::: graph
### Graph View

:::: graph-outer
::: {#graph-container cfg="{\"drag\":true,\"zoom\":true,\"depth\":1,\"scale\":1.1,\"repelForce\":0.5,\"centerForce\":0.3,\"linkDistance\":30,\"fontSize\":0.6,\"opacityScale\":1,\"showTags\":true,\"removeTags\":[],\"focusOnHover\":false}"}
:::

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
::::

:::: {#global-graph-outer}
::: {#global-graph-container cfg="{\"drag\":true,\"zoom\":true,\"depth\":-1,\"scale\":0.9,\"repelForce\":0.5,\"centerForce\":0.3,\"linkDistance\":30,\"fontSize\":0.6,\"opacityScale\":1,\"showTags\":true,\"removeTags\":[],\"focusOnHover\":true}"}
:::
